import React from 'react' import SearchIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Search'; import ShoppingBasketIcon from '@mui/icons-material/ShoppingBasket'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useStateValue } from "./StateProvider"; import "./Header.css" function Header() { const [{ basket, user }, dispatch] = useStateValue(); return ( <>
Hello Guest Sign In
Return Orders
Your Prime
{basket?.length}
) } export default Header
